title: cmd/godoc: playground height not initialized correctly
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Use a link with a hash to access an example in godoc:
golang.org/pkg/strings/#example_Map
2. The height of the code textarea doesn't fit the content.

What is the expected output? The height of the code textarea should fit the whole code

What do you see instead? Only the first two lines of the example

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

Which operating system are you using? Mac OSX

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version') devel +a1fe2e3fadb0

Please provide any additional information below.
